name: Ozone (itch) (Qwark, jeromedac)
description:
This game is only availaible on Windows.

Since their population growth, Humans are constantly contributing to their own extinction. Factories, deforestation and even nuclear bombs, when all you are trying to do is protect them. You, the Ozone layer.

"How long will you manage to protect our dear blue planet ?"

In this game you play as the ozone layer. Your goal is to protect the Earth from the sun's rays, by absorbing them. But mankind has an annoying tendency to destroy you little by little... Fortunately, the Earth also has some good surprises in store and can sometimes help you in your task.

Don't forget to send us your video or your review in the comment section ! We're looking forward to hear you !

TEAM :

  • Jérôme Dacremont (Artist)
  • Robby Schneider (Artist)
  • Etienne Robert (Developper)
